    gather_and_summarise()
    Gather Questions into One Table for Graphing
    generate_plot()
    This function generates a bar plot using ggplot2 and a custom Carpentries theme. It allows for specifying variables for the x-axis, y-axis, and fill color. The plot is faceted by year and quarter. Text labels indicating the y-values are also included above the bars.
    get_env_var()
    Retrieve Environment Variable Value

    Group Data by a Specified Column and Summarize Counts
